website_summaries.verdict: The Kodak Pixpro FZ53 is a slim compact camera with an affordable price tag and 5x zoom lens, but its image quality is disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Features not usually found at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Having control of EV (+/- 2) means I can dial in the best exposure. Attached picture is moonlight in backyard, using time exposure. Haven't tried panorama yet, but looks interesting. Small enough to fit in shirt/jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: db-GIS

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but lousy instructions
customer_reviews.text: This was replacing an older model of this camera, so I expected it to provide good service and produce excellent photos. What I did not expect was that the only instructions included were very unsatisfactory cursory instructions on how to set up the camera. I had to go online to find the full instructions, then print them off. I know this is quite the current style, but it is annoying to say the least. Also, the camera has the disturbing habit of slipping into video mode for no apparent reason. Other than that, I like it and it does produce good photos.
customer_reviews.author: Martine Renoir

customer_reviews.title: This camera is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for my needs. Great photos and video. Very compact. The only improvement I would make would be a higher volume for videos. Sound comes through great when downloaded but very low while viewing playback from the camera. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Constance L. Waymire

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera as a gift for boyfriend. We've only had the camera for a few days. Very easy to use, light weight, fits into a shirt pocket well. It is somewhat small for his hands. The on/off button is small, so that is a little difficult to manage. I was glad to see there was a adapter for the USB with the charger so it can plug into the wall when needed. I think we will enjoy this one. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Silva

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Camera For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Since I had an earlier model Kodak camera before, it was easy for me to adapt to this one. I also like the fact that it came with a rechargeable battery, since my earlier camera required battery change outs. I am an occasional camera user, and do not take professional photos, so this camera is very suitable for me.
customer_reviews.author: George Bednar

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Works exactly as described. Simple use and the only drawback is you have to USB charge it. That's not a problem for me but on travel, not as easy as having a few extra AA batteries in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Practical and useful
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use, takes great pictures and doesn't need to have its batteries changed every time I turn around.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Bennett

customer_reviews.title: this camera I cannot figure out how to use
customer_reviews.text: this camera seems so complicated and I wanted a point and shoot simple camera. I do not like this camera at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie L Mays

customer_reviews.title: Will not recharge replacement batteries - a common defect ...
customer_reviews.text: We were pleased with this camera until the original battery needed to be replaced. The camera is unable to charge any of several replacement batteries and is therefore now useless. It seems that an inability to recharge batteries is a common problem with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Flagman

customer_reviews.title: Recorded in .MOV format
customer_reviews.text: camara is ok. pictures could be clearer and more crisp, feels like lighting has a big impact in how well your pictures come out. the sound when playing video is almost non existent. when transferring videos to my laptop i was unable to view without issues due to the incompatibility with the .mov format. When the file is converted to mp4 the video was playable. price isnt bad, but you kind of get what you pay for here. would not doubt there being better options available.
customer_reviews.author: adrian c.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality pics .... piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The flash is right where the button is to take a picture and blocks part of the flash when holding the camera ....poor design.... Picture quality is terrible ..... and the battery life is substandard ...
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Easy Cameras
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are easy to use and very light. My students love using them. They take great photos, too.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a week
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, worked for about a week. This is the second one purchased as I thought the first was defective. Apparently ALL of these are defective. Do Not waste your money on this camera, as it is a piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 1 day. Wouldn’t turn on. Battery was fully charged but the camera was dead.
customer_reviews.author: J. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Have had this camera for a short time and I'm going to need to buy a new one because it no longer works. Sometimes it shuts off, won't take pictures, or takes a picture and won't show up when you plug it in. Have had this product for less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a camera for a few weeks so I just ordered for christmas. I was very happy with how easy it was and the pictures were very good. Battery charger very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: More Like a Kid's Camera
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was hoping for. I gave it to my 10 year old to take pictures. Photo quality is not as good as my inexpensive cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tellier

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the simplicity in operating this camera with buttons that can be seen easily.
customer_reviews.author: birddy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cameras I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera. I wish I could buy another one just like it. It was compact, easy to use, and took great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Bequette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 75 year old father in law who still has a flip phone! He really likes it and is now enjoying taking pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work off the charger and the battery closure doesn't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: Lesson learned. My son got this for Christmas 2019 and just now took it out of the box. It is the wrong color, and it doesn't work when off the charger. The battery door doesn't stay closed either. When you get the camera, try it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Tea Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My kid really loves this camera
customer_reviews.text: I chose Kodak for my kid’s first digital camera since my very first one was also Kodak. He really loves this camera and runs great. When filming more than 15 mins, it starts lagging but it should be fine for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kyoung

customer_reviews.title: great mini
customer_reviews.text: ten years ago i paid $700.00 for a sony digital that does the exact same thing this $80.00 camera does. imo i think this is a great camera for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: You can download photos into Windows 7, but not Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: I tried to download a few photos onto my new Windows 10 PC and they were rejected as being incompatible. It worked ok with my old Windows 7 PC. Operating instructions were printed too small to read. On line version is 60+ pages and didn't help with the transfer problem. Definitely not a camera for a novice. Also, as others have noted, battery needs recharging every day or every few photos.
customer_reviews.author: Raydtek

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This one is slimer than my previous model Kodak is a great product anyone can use this camera the pictures are good at 16 mp the video is 720p and it takes the photos fast with the right sd card class 10 is the best .
customer_reviews.author: david refoua

customer_reviews.title: kodak camera
customer_reviews.text: i have had this camera for over two years. last year it stopped connecting to the micro cord connected to computer. therefore i am unable to transfer my pictures to any computer or phone. sadly warranty ran out a couple months after buying this camera. just something to consider. now i need a new camera that will allow me to setup, print out pictures via computer, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyanna DeTuathana

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my mother-in-law. She has been very pleased with it and it functions as expected. It was her first digital camera and she found it pretty intuitive and easy to you, and is very happy with her pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera took excellent pictures and was light and small for easy touring.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: takes better pictures and is 10% smaller and lighter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to replace an older Kodak version that was dropped too many times. Powers on and readies itself for picture taking much faster, takes better pictures and is 10% smaller and lighter. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: This is a good camera for amateurs who like to take lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera for amateurs who like to take lots of pictures. It is also affordable and convenient to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter to take her own pictures. Works great. Easy to print pictures. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an elderly man so he can take photos of people tail-gating him. Easy to use, clear and crisp photos and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vermonter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year-old son loves taking my phone to take pictures of lizards and bugs around the yard. We bought this, an expansion memory card, and case for his birthday. The pictures come out great. Its a great little point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Thecompton

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Easy to Use Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've used the camera on a couple of occasions, and found it easy to use. Picture quality is very good. I'm happy with the choice, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TRMartin

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with the camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the camera. I have a hard time holding a camera still when I take pictures but with this camera the pictures still come out in focus.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Okay for now
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. But my photos don't come out crisp and clear, as some have stated. I use the "shake-less" feature, and sometimes I still can't hold the camera still enough, and the photos are not exactly in focus. I will keep this camera, as it was one of the cheapest I could find and still be worthwhile, but I am not a photography buff, so I don't exactly know how to get the best use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: midwest glamour

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.  And it will work with battery packs.
customer_reviews.text: The company was very friendly. They shipped my camera using UPS Ground instead of UPS Surepost. I have a PO Box and UPS Surepost has problems shipping items to me because of this. The best news is that this camera (unlike others) will operate using a smartphone power bank. I'm so pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Speedlearner

customer_reviews.title: Handy Cam
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera - just what I wanted - takes great pictures
customer_reviews.author: MadAnni

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: just what I was looking for. still trying to read the instructions but used 1st time and took pretty good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rus

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Well satisfied. Seems like a good camera for the price. Fairly easy to use, I just don't use it enough to remember the settings. Fits well in pocket, easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for Easy Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: This Kodak camera takes really nice photos for me. Nice and clear....and in focus! I'm very happy with it. You should know that I am not a professional photographer but enjoy clear pictures. This does the job handsomely and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Guitar

customer_reviews.title: perfect pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: I had this same camera a few years ago and it worked great. This new one has some improvements over the old one - takes great pictures, can fit into my pocket or purse and has a rechargable battery pack instead of batteries like the old one had.
customer_reviews.author: Lois B.

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Really small, zoom & tele were hard to adjust property, couldn't see screen in day light.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Waste if money for me
customer_reviews.text: Horrible picture color. I have adjusted everything!!! I have used every mode and every setting in manual mode. It has been a total waste of money for the camera and the low 16g card I had to buy to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harper BC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to purchase a camera for our kids without it being a cell phone (No need for that). Camera is perfect for everyone to use and the rechargeable battery is a no brainer. Great everyday camera.
customer_reviews.author: nydreamer

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: comes with many features. can use in auto mode where camera does all the work or you can use manual mode and customize your photos, also has a panomeric setting for wide landscape views.
customer_reviews.author: timothy foster

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good point & shoot camera with clear pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good point & shoot camera with clear pictures. If you're looking for something more look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: BluesPiano88

customer_reviews.title: Being technical helps
customer_reviews.text: This little guy does everything and there'sd a 95 page instruction manual on the internet to tell you how to do it all. On the other hand, it can serve very well as an aim and shoot basic camera. Either way you'll make great use of it.
customer_reviews.author: RonO

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes there is a streak of light showing in video or picture. Colors at times are nit exactly as they are in real....at kesst on the viewer it seems like thst. Has great features builtin to camera. Bought it for 12 year old daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob or Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera; great features, eat to use; definitely better than a cell phone. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joplinspig

customer_reviews.title: It takes very good pictures and it's nice that there is a button ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as her first camera and she loves it. It takes very good pictures and it's nice that there is a button for video and a button just for taking a picture instead of having to go to a menu to get video. Easy to use and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Momto3

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Features
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Kodak Pixpro we bought for the business. The only thing is the battery that comes with the camera only last a couple of hours. You are force to buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: All Green Building Products

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: Not at all for kids breaks when dropped. I know cameras are not ment to be dropped but this one is not sturdy in the least. For something portable it is like class.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the price. I use it on my motorcycle where I don't want to take out my $800 cell phone to take pics.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera because it was smaller than the Kodak C653 that I am using now. The camera itself was a good fit, but after I recieved it I realized that the USB cable and charger were not included. (Page 11 of the users manual clearly states that these two items were to be included with my camera purchase.) So as the battery was already dead and after consulting the seller, without any satisfaction I returned the camera and am going to continue using my C653.
customer_reviews.author: Popcorn man

customer_reviews.title: stopped working too fast
customer_reviews.text: my daughter has this phone since may 2019. she took great care of it. a few months ago the battery stopped recharging so i ordered new ones but the camera still doesnt work. 6 months is to short a life for a 75$ camera
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall this little camera is great for day to day use
customer_reviews.text: Overall this little camera is great for day to day use. It makes very good general pictures. Only issue is extreme closeups it gets a little blurry. Otherwise was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pics, easy to use and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this camera! I like that it doesn’t require a smart phone to be dragged into woods and school trips. It is easy to use and she likes that it’s red.
customer_reviews.author: J-Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera - nice size, easy to use - we bought this for a 16 year old and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: mellym

customer_reviews.title: too basic can't compete with a cellphone
customer_reviews.text: the picture quality is not that good, plus zooms is very limited. I ended up using my cellphone more than the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Victor S. Toledo

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: battery doesn't last. small memory card. buttons too small. hard to open battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Slender and size
customer_reviews.text: Have not had opportunity to use yet except for taking practice pictures to learn the camera. But am taking to my Granddaughter's wedding for special pictures. Could rate this better after I have used it more. I am hoping it is as fine of a camera as you advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this fits anyone's needs at the $80.00 price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Not a great image quality camera. All my family phones are better. I bought for my wife to use. Lots of tears. Too confusing and the anti shake is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Brower

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the money. Easy to use. Nice quality pictures. Haven’t had a problem with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The only problem with it is that when you post pictures from it on Facebook they are all automatically labeled with "KODAK Digital Still Camera." If you don't want that on all your pictures you have to manually delete it on each individual picture, one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: A nice camera as long as it works
customer_reviews.text: A nice camera as long as it works. It lasted about a week before it failed with "write protected" on memory card. The card read perfectly on our PC. A new card made no difference. Returned camera for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: i am sure i will like the camera however it took Amazon a month to get it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dean Carey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera Slow on taking pictures repeatedly Still great buy and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Ernestine Morris

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to fit in your shirt or jeans pocket
customer_reviews.text: Great little pocket camera for quick photos. Pictures are clear and colorful. Easy to use. You can use a tripod stand.
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Like the camera, battery doesn’t last as long as my previous camera
customer_reviews.author: James  Csolak

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: My kids got these for Christmas from Santa... It's a great camera. It is small and easy for the kids to handle. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality isn't great but overall it works well for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I bought it for someone else, but may have to buy myself one because I like it so much. It's easy to use and small enough to slid into your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: T. Burk

customer_reviews.title: Our 7-year-old granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy for a 7-year-old to use, has a lanyard for her wrist so she won't drop it, takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Great look but I need to use them I write a review
customer_reviews.author: Francisco B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price,great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few days but I love it! Real easy to use and takes great pictures. Battery charges quick, and the size is perfect to carry in my purse. Would definitely recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Janice H

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kid, he loves it, simple and intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Omer Aharony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Basic features. Easy to use. Good quality for those who don't like technology
customer_reviews.author: soulfull68701

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Good pictures and much easier that phone cameras. This one was an upgraded model of another just like it, almost, I bought 8 yrs ago. Very nice camera
customer_reviews.author: mark f

customer_reviews.title: This is surprisingly a good camera! I was very pleased when I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly a good camera! I was very pleased when I purchased it. However, It didn't last very long. It was not durable, so I would spend the extra money and purchase FZ152 that does a lot more for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Jean

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size of camera and clarity. Unfortunately, stolen in Mexico, so had to buy a replacement! Which I did!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Takes Nice Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera, but it has no way of deleting the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: a little difficult to navigate through but it is a good camera
customer_reviews.author: carol brasington

customer_reviews.title: Its so cute
customer_reviews.text: Pictures look good. Nice little point and shoot camera to take photos for work
customer_reviews.author: Meekz

customer_reviews.title: Slow shutter speed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not do what I wanted. Shutter speed very slow for my work. Keep pushing the video button instead of shooting a still photograph. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Laz

customer_reviews.title: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ53
customer_reviews.text: Okay starter camera for my daughter, has a couple issues but still an overall ok camera.
customer_reviews.author: IFISHAZ

customer_reviews.title: Miss the return deadline.
customer_reviews.text: Malfunctioning camera. It cannot accept memory cards without erring. Unfortunately I cannot return. As far a I know, this camera is JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: George Howington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice camera for those who want point and shoot technology. 16 megapixels produce sharp pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shuts down when hit play button to see videos and pics. Not all videos record with audio :'(
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very disappointed :(. Every time I take a picture and play back to try and see it, the camera completely shuts down. As soon as I hit that play button, it turns off. And I tried recording my son's baseball games and to my surprise, some videos had audio and others didn't. Picture quality is alright I guess. :/
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Personally I would not recommend the camera just because of this
customer_reviews.text: Camera seems to be ok...except the directions for use..(92 pages !) is horrid! They are confusing to say the least and are very hard to follow. I finally gave up and the camera now just sits on the side counter and is collecting dust. This is the first camera I have purchased and have been unable to follow what should have been just simple directions. Personally I would not recommend the camera just because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Mindtraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, instructions are very easy as well! Nice photos would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: koiboy56

customer_reviews.title: It takes good pictures but the screen is blurry
customer_reviews.text: Such a small camera, I was a bit shocked when I opened it. It takes good pictures but the screen is blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fancher

customer_reviews.title: a very great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera & it takes really good pictures ! It's easy to set up and run ......... I give this camera 5 stars .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is opening a whole new world up for my grandson. He is noticing the small details around him.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bought in August 2018
customer_reviews.text: After about 4 months it just stopped working. Dumb me bought another one...but battery powered...after a couple months..same thing. IT was easy to use and good pics but dang they just STOP working.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: Battery no longer charges, only had this camera for one year.
customer_reviews.author: stacy moak

customer_reviews.title: Its small and very easy to use!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it to take pictures of my crazy kitty..My beautiful house plants and some fantastic sunsets!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: marcia mesa

customer_reviews.title: Good basic camera
customer_reviews.text: Good first camera for a preteen. Has many options and filters that can be used. Love that it is rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kopa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent camera! perfect for my mother who doesn't use a smart phone!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryn Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It takes really great pictures. It's very easy to use. Wish it would have come with a case though.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K.

product_meta.title: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ53-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 5X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:FZ535x optical zoom 28mm wide angle 16 megapixels 2.7 LCD screen 720P HD video. Power = Rechargeable Li-ion Battery LB-012, 3.7V 700mAh, In-Camera Charging .

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars856 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
